EmailTemplate.subject: Bite the Ballot Changemakers - Session 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, Changemakers!
Thank you so much to those of you who took part in our first Changemakers session back in December.
Your ideas for how you would engage a community you care about for National Voter Registration Drive (NVRD) from February 1st - 7th were amazing. At the end of the session, you were called to action to:
a) Register to vote: see here for more information about registering to vote, and here to register b) Make your NVRD ideas come to life and help us make history this February
The next #TeamNVRD meet-ups are next week - can't wait to see you all again! We'll be bringing all of you together to plan, discuss, and supporting each others' ideas. You have a choice of two days and locations, to make it easier for you to attend - click the relevant link below to get your free Eventbrite ticket (make sure you only sign up to one!):
Thursday 14th January in Waterloo (Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 &NQ) Friday 15th January in Kentish Town (Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL)
If you can't attend either, please email graduates@the-challenge.org.
Bite the Ballot and The Challenge are going to make history this February. We invite you to be there.
#TakePower
